content.p: As an external borrower you can: The use of the sports facilities is free of charge and available to all alumni. To get access to our sports facilities, all you need to do is contact the Alumni Relations team. To find out more about our sports facilities, please visit the Y.M. Tengku Tan Sri Dato' Seri Ahmad Rithauddeen Sports Complex website. On-campus accommodation for alumni is provided on a case by case basis. If you would like to book accommodation, please contact Alumni Relations team. The centre comprises several: To book our facilities, please contact Alumni Relations team. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
